Desc.eng: No. But I was expecting you. I need your help. In my arrogance I opened up the Gate of Perun… and I couldn’t bind the frost spirits that came pouring out. They are swarming everywhere.
Please tell me you had an emergency plan.
I have a very powerful moonstone... take it to the gate, touch it to the stone... it will close the doorway. But the spirits are everywhere... they will kill you!
Hm. It’s never easy, isn’t it?
Do I really have to be voice of reason? It's so boring. But a magical gate that opens into the winter itself must be one those powerful seals. If we close it, we break it.
We can't have monsters swarming all over the place. We deal with the frost spirits first, then see what we can do about the gate.
You are right. It's painful to admit but we should leave that gate alone.
